thread.title_full: 'Bigg Boss 9': Sonam Kapoor shakes a leg with Salman Khan, puzzles Keith Sequeira! - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'Bigg Boss 9': Sonam Kapoor shakes a leg with Salman Khan, puzzles Keith Sequeira!
text: The recently kick-started season 9 of reality show ' Bigg Boss ' concluded it's first weekend episode with much excitement. The fashionista of Bollywood Sonam Kapoor visited the show looking stunning in a beige lehenga. Ecstatic to be sharing the big screens with Salman Khan in 'Prem Ratan Dhan Payo', Sonam graced the elimination episode to promote the film releasing this Diwali. Â»
